select distinct i.* from invoice i left join customer c on (i.customer_id=c.customer_id) left join customer_sales cs on (c.customer_id=cs.customer_id) where
i.business_id IN #businessIds[]#
i.invoice_id = #invoiceId#

i.invoice_date >= #fromInvoiceDate#
i.invoice_date <= #toInvoiceDate#
i.payment_status=#paymentStatusList[]#

select sum(res.cost * res.cost_exchange_rate) as total_cost, sum(res.charge * res.charge_exchange_rate) as total_charge, res.month, res.month_name as 'month_name', res.year from (select c.cost as cost, monthname(a.invoice_date) as month_name, year(a.invoice_date) as 'year', month(a.invoice_date) as 'month', COALESCE( (select b1.exch_rate from currency_symbol a1, exchange_rate_currency b1 where a1.id = c.cost_currency and a1.currency_code = b1.cur_from and b1.cur_to = #currency#), 1 ) as cost_exchange_rate, c.charge as charge, COALESCE( (select b1.exch_rate from currency_symbol a1, exchange_rate_currency b1 where a1.id = c.charge_currency and a1.currency_code = b1.cur_from and b1.cur_to = #currency#), 1 ) as charge_exchange_rate from invoice a, invoice_charges b, charges c where 1 = 1
and a.business_id IN #businessIds[]#
a.customer_id = #customerId#
and year(a.invoice_date) = #year#
month(a.invoice_date) = #month#
and a.invoice_id = b.invoice_id and c.id = b.charge_id and c.status !=40 ) as res group by res.month

select sum(charge),res.email_type from( SELECT s.email_type, coalesce(( select cg.is_tax from charge_group cg, carrier_charge_code ccc where ccc.carrier_id = ch.carrier_id and ccc.charge_code = ch.charge_code and (SELECT IF((ch.charge_code_level_2 is NULL),true,(ccc.charge_code_level_2 = ch.charge_code_level_2))) and cg.id = ccc.charge_group_id limit 1 ),0) as is_tax, ch.charge AS charge FROM invoice_charges ic, shipping_order so, charges ch, service s WHERE ic.invoice_id = #invoiceId# and so.order_id = ic.order_id and ic.charge_id=ch.id and ic.cancelled_invoice='No' and ch.type = 1 and ch.status !=40 and s.service_id=so.service_id ) as res where res.is_tax = 0 group by res.email_type
